mapper.insert: INSERT INTO meeting ( meet_no , depo_amount , depo_bank , depo_account, depo_deadline, depo_acc_holder, entryfee , min_party, max_party, chief_id, depo_condition, meet_time, deadline_time, post_no) VALUES ( seq_meeting_meet_no.nextval, #{depoAmount:NUMERIC} , #{depoBank:VARCHAR} , #{depoAccount:VARCHAR} , #{depoDeadline:DATE} , #{depoAccHolder:VARCHAR} , #{entryfee:NUMERIC} , #{minParty:NUMERIC} , #{maxParty:NUMERIC}, #{cheifId}, #{depoCondition}, #{meetTime}, #{deadlineTime:DATE}, seq_post_post_no.currval)
mapper.select: SELECT meet_no , depo_amount , depo_bank , depo_account, depo_deadline, depo_acc_holder, entryfee , min_party, max_party, chief_id, depo_condition, meet_time, deadline_time, post_no FROM meeting WHERE post_no = #{value}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO meeting ( join_no, join_date, join_status, depo_status, post_no, party_id, delete_status) VALUES ( seq_join_join_no.nextval, #{joinDate} , #{joinStatus} , #{depoStatus:VARCHAR} , #{postNo} , #{partyId:VARCHAR} , #{deleteStatus} )
mapper.select: SELECT join_no , join_date , join_status , depo_status, post_no, party_id, delete_status FROM join WHERE join_no = #{value}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT inner_table.* , ROWNUM AS row_seq FROM ( SELECT m.meet_no, m.post_no, m.min_party, m.max_party, m.depo_condition, m.meet_time, m.deadline_time, m.entryfee FROM meeting m, post p WHERE m.post_no = p.post_no ) inner_table WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endRowNum} ) WHERE row_seq BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT inner_table.* , ROWNUM AS row_seq FROM ( SELECT join_no, join_date, join_status, depo_status, post_no, party_id, delete_status FROM join ORDER BY join_date DESC ) inner_table WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endRowNum} ) WHERE row_seq BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM( SELECT meet_no, post_no, min_party, max_party, depo_condition, meet_time, deadline_time, entryfee FROM meeting ) countTable
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM( SELECT join_no, join_date, join_status, depo_status, post_no, party_id, delete_status FROM join ) countTable
